Text:
Why was it ripped to WMV, why not a decent video format like H264 (X264) which is a more advanced video format, especially for file-size versus quality. X264 is totally free, has constantly on-going development which puts it above all other H264 formats, let alone WMV.

WMV is only native to Windows, not linux or mac. MPeg 4 H264 is a universal format. I hate WMV with a passion. lol :D

Thanks original uploader and seeders!!! ;)
